layout.name: id
layout.title: Background Area ID
layout.tooltip: the ID of the background area. Each background area should have a unique ID! Use this ID for the background positioner to draw this background area.

layout.name: scale
layout.title: Scale
layout.tooltip: the scale the background area is drawn at.

layout.name: rotation
layout.title: Rotation
layout.tooltip: by how many degrees the area is rotated when drawn.

layout.name: drawPriority
layout.title: Priority
layout.tooltip: at which render priority the area is drawn.

layout.name: color
layout.title: Backdrop Colour
layout.tooltip: The colour of the backdrop. The farther back the section is (based on scale), the more it will be tinted in this colour. The lower the alpha value, the weaker the effect is

layout.name: leftMargin
layout.title: Left Edge Margin
layout.tooltip: how many pixels the camera can reach out over the left edge of the area when inside. Not affected by scale.

layout.name: rightMargin
layout.title: Right Edge Margin
layout.tooltip: how many pixels the camera can reach out over the right edge of the area when inside. Not affected by scale.

layout.name: topMargin
layout.title: Top Edge Margin
layout.tooltip: how many pixels the camera can reach out over the top edge of the area when inside. Not affected by scale.

layout.name: bottomMargin
layout.title: Bottom Edge Margin
layout.tooltip: how many pixels the camera can reach out over the bottom edge of the area when inside. Not affected by scale.
